title: Sagamore Hill National Historic Site: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Traveling Trunks Sagamore Hill National Historic Site invites your upper elementary classes to take a FREE in-school field trip, embarking on a journey through the life and times of President Theodore Roosevelt. All Traveling Trunks       Traveling Trunk Learn More     Field Trips Your class can take a tour of the Roosevelt home, followed by an exciting history scavenger hunt in the Theodore Roosevelt Museum at Old Orchard. All Field Trips       Field Trips Learn More
